subject: Baseball
Steroids
lead_paragraph: Barry Bonds trudged back to court to again plead his innocence. Hank Aaron dined on his 75th birthday alongside a former president. The contrast could not have been more striking.
snippet: Barry Bonds trudged back to court to again plead his innocence. Hank Aaron dined on his 75th birthday alongside a former president. The contrast could not have been more striking.
